svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Literacy rate of young men and women, 2015
The shown literacy rate refers to the population between 15 and 24 years.
Youth literacy rate, population 15-24 years, female (%)
Youth literacy rate, population 15-24 years, male (%)
